CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 山谷；谷；流域；溪谷；河谷；低地；屋面排水沟；屋顶斜沟；（城市中的）低洼地带

word_group.brief_definition: 卢瓦尔河谷；卢瓦尔河流域
沙漠山谷；沙漠谷地；沙漠峡谷
雾覆盖的山谷；雾笼罩的山谷

bilingual.source: His favourite expedition was to the lost valley.
bilingual.target: 他最喜欢的探险是去失落的山谷。

bilingual.source: She was trapped here in this secret valley, perhaps for ever.
bilingual.target: 她被困在这个秘密山谷里，也许永远无法离开。

bilingual.source: She was in a broad valley, surrounded on every side by sheer, jagged cliffs and escarpments.
bilingual.target: 她在一个宽阔的山谷中，四周被陡峭的悬崖和峭壁包围。

bilingual.source: We need to measure the valley value of the valley.
bilingual.target: 我们需要测量山谷的谷值。
他们在山谷中徒步旅行。

list.abstract: valley（英 [ˈvæli]，美 [ˈvæli]），英语单词，作名词为山谷；溪谷；屋顶斜沟。例句：Over 5,000 children attend the Kopila Valley School.（5000多名儿童在Kopila Valley学校上学。） 近义词有hollow。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the central valley today. And this, in a rare aerial survey from the 1930s, shows the exact same valley as a barren desert. The valley's natural state.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是今天的中央山谷，而这里是上世纪30年代拍摄的同一地区的航拍图象，看上去，这同样的地方在当时，仍然是荒凉的沙漠，这是山谷原本的状态。

yingyinNormal.en: Unless you can make it to the end of the valley. There's a boat. It can save you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除非你们可以逃出山谷那端 那里有艘船可以救你们。

yingyinNormal.en: This is California's central valley,and my guide is farmer Ted Sheeley.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里是加利福尼亚的中央山谷，我的向导是农场主泰德·舍利。

yingyinNormal.en: Because we saw what's up there. The dam's gonna break. The entire valley's gonna flood.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们看到了上面的状况 水坝快决堤，会淹没整个山谷。

yingyinNormal.en: Perhaps this puts things into context a little bit, Paul, because in the bottom of the valley there, down in the trees there, that is Redbournberry Mill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许这能说明这一点，保罗，因为在山谷的底部，在那些树那里，就是红磨坊。

yingyinNormal.en: Kai attacked the valley. He's taken every Master in china including Shifu and the others. It's all gone, Po. Everything, everyone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 天煞袭击了山谷，他抓走了那里所有的功夫大师，包括师父他们，他们，全都走了，阿宝，一切，所有人。

yingyinNormal.en: On the island's northern tip, in the Polol Valley, overlook the sprawling forest reserves of Hawaii's lush northern region, the birthplace of Kamehameha the First.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在岛的北端，波罗陆山谷上，俯瞰夏威夷北部繁茂的森林保护区，卡米哈米哈一世的出生地。

yingyinNormal.en: A staggering 50% of America's fruits and nuts are grown in California's central valley, what's effectively a giant, open-air food factory powered by the sun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 美国消费的一半的水果和坚果都产自加州中央山谷，那是一个巨大的露天工厂，驱动力就是太阳。

yingyinNormal.en: You have brought peace to this valley and to me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为和谷带来安宁，也给我带来了安宁。

yingyinNormal.en: This Jordan Valley thing's a mess. He's in big trouble.
yingyinNormal.zh: 约旦河谷真是一团糟。他有大麻烦了。

yingyinNormal.en: Cathy? The Russians remain intransigent on the Jordan Valley.
yingyinNormal.zh: 俄罗斯在约旦河谷问题上仍不肯妥协。

yingyinNormal.en: Listen, I'm going to Noe Valley, Chris. Take care of yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，我要赶去诺亚谷，克里斯你保重。

yingyinNormal.en: Silicon Valley's a very provincial town. I can't get a job anywhere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 硅谷是个小地方，出了这事我就找不到工作了。

yingyinNormal.en: London is situated in the South-East of England in the Thames Valley.
yingyinNormal.zh: 伦敦位于英格兰的东南部，在泰晤士河上。

yingyinNormal.en: If you go to the Jordan Valley, you have to walk away with a solution.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你去了约旦河谷，就必须谈出个结果来。

yingyinNormal.en: You think that's the first stop that we made? We've been all over the valley.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你觉得我们仅仅止步于此吗？我们将走遍整个硅谷。

yingyinNormal.en: We have to do something! We can't let him march on the valley, take his revenge!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们得马上行动，不能让太狼回到和谷村来报仇，荼害百姓。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Twistle. Actually, I'm on my way to Noe Valley also. How about we share a ride?
yingyinNormal.zh: 托斯特尔先生，我正好也要去诺亚谷，我搭个车怎么样?

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. What's our main objective here? To get Russian troops out of the Jordan Valley.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对。但我们的主要目标是什么？让俄军撤离约旦河谷。

yingyinNormal.en: It means, you know, just going around and punching and kicking, defending the valley and stuff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 意味着...我要四处闯荡，拳打脚踢，保卫家园什么的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a low area of land between hills or mountains, typically with a river or stream flowing through it

examination_example.sentence: Humans overwhelmingly live in <highlight>valleys</highlight>, and on supplies of fresh water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类几乎完全生活在山谷中，依靠淡水供应。

examination_example.sentence: Carter sifted through rubble in the <highlight>Valley</highlight> of the Kings for seven years before he located the tomb in 1922.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1922年，卡特在帝王谷的废墟中搜寻了7年，终于找到了这座陵墓。

examination_example.sentence: Olduvai Gorge, an early hominid site in Tanzania, was found by a butterfly hunter who literally fell into its deep <highlight>valley</highlight> in 1911.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 奥杜瓦伊峡谷是坦桑尼亚早期的原始人遗址，是由一位蝴蝶猎人发现的，他在1911年掉进了峡谷深处。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a low area of land between hills or mountains, typically with a river or stream flowing through it

examination_example.sentence: Its remote <highlight>valleys</highlight> were appealing to him and his family.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那里偏远的山谷对他和他的家人很有吸引力。

examination_example.sentence: The culture of Silicon <highlight>Valley</highlight> ought not to be emulated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 硅谷的文化不应该被模仿。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a low area of land between hills or mountains; typically with a river or stream flowing through it

examination_example.sentence: "I think there is a broad consciousness in the <highlight>Valley</highlight> that we can do better than to leave thousands of our neighbors behind."
examination_example.sentence_trans: “我认为硅谷有一种广泛的意识，即我们可以做得更好，而不是把成千上万的邻居抛在身后。”

examination_example.sentence: As Silicon <highlight>Valley</highlight> has become home to more successful companies, the flood of people to the area has cased housing prices to skyrocket.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着硅谷成为更多成功公司的大本营，大量人口涌入该地区，导致房价飙升。

examination_example.sentence: With Silicon <highlight>Valley</highlight> in its backyard, it certainly has the chance do so.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有硅谷在它的后院，它当然有机会做到这一点。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: But that changed when a system of high-tech mirrors was introduced to reflect sunlight from neighboring peaks (山峰) into the <highlight>valley</highlight> below.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，当一个高科技镜子系统被引入，将阳光从邻近的山峰反射到下面的山谷时，这种情况发生了变化。

examination_example.sentence: We see the sky is blue, but down in the <highlight>valley</highlight> it's darker — it's like on a cloudy day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们看到天空是蓝色的，但山谷里的天空更暗——就像是在阴天。

examination_example.sentence: I work with Volunteers for Wildlife, a rescue and education organization at Bailey Arboretum in Locust <highlight>Valley</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我和野生动物志愿者一起工作，这是蝗虫谷Bailey植物园的一个救援和教育组织。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Beautiful <highlight>Valley</highlight> Farm is at 395 Ribera South Road.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美丽山谷农场位于里贝拉南路395号。

examination_example.sentence: The giant dish is built on a howl-like <highlight>valley</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个巨大的盘子建在一个嚎叫般的山谷上。

examination_example.sentence: Over 5,000 children attend the Kopila <highlight>Valley</highlight> School.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 超过5000名儿童在科皮拉山谷学校上学。
